short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pokemon wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Pokemon background. Pokemon wallpaper background themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Pokemon wallpapers with each new tab.
2. Choose or randomize your Pokemon background in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for task management.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Add sites to the Shortcut panel for faster access.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to More Themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Immediate access to wallpaper downloads.
14. Quick links to gaming sites.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Pokemon new tab.
